resources.string: The currency depends on your system\'s language locale. To change:\n 1. Go to general management under Settings\n 2. Select Language and change to your preference.
Storehouse is free to download and use for the first three months from launch. Afterwards, to use Storehouse, you have to pay for it.

Storehouse is not a complete application and the developer wants to ensure Storehouse keeps up with modern innovations and advancements by releasing frequent updates, bug fixes and exciting new features. Making Storehouse paid enables the developer to provide you the users with up to date and well maintained product.
